html:
5.29.22  2:04 pm   Thoughts on France?

      plausible

5.29.22  1:29 pm   how many scenes/settings in your new video were already made before you started on the video?

      none, unless you are talking about the video that came out 3 weeks ago in which case the answer is 18

5.29.22  8:46 am   what was the last fact you learned that shocked you?

      viola is actually LARGER than violin

5.29.22  8:29 am   do you need a saddle to ride a horse or is there a newer, more fashionable way?

      automobile?

5.29.22  4:27 am   where do you get funky sounds?

      i only have normal sounds, which forces me to use them funkily

5.29.22  2:11 am   A lot of people seem to ask what your songs are about, but no one seems to ask what you are about.  

     i've been asked that

     Are they the same question?

      no

5.29.22  1:29 am   Do you like Pokémon?

      never heard of it

5.29.22  12:17 am   do you have opinions on opinions?

      yes they're very good and i like them very much and so should other people as well

5.29.22  12:00 am   Is your next song about press conferences?

      no but i can see why you would think that

5.28.22  11:48 pm   whats the worst song youve ever heard

      i've never heard a bad song

5.28.22  10:07 pm   When creating scenes for your videos, do you get an idea of how the scene will look and move first and try to replicate that,

     sometimes yes

      or do you just come up with things on the spot?

     sometimes yes

     Additionally, do you ever consider what the video will look like while writing the song?

     yes

5.28.22  7:34 pm   Is "Kyle" one syllable or 2? 

      1

5.28.22  6:54 pm   what would you consider your greatest achievement

      haven't done it yet

5.28.22  6:39 pm   Did you learn the rules, break them, make your own, and break those too?

      i don't see why not

5.28.22  6:15 pm   How did Steve escape the mountains when it was INFINITELY raining? Did Steve have an umbrella?

      the video ended

5.28.22  5:13 pm   people really be like "here's a secret!" and then tell you what that secret is...so it's not a "secret" anymore. why do they do this?

      clickbait

5.28.22  4:18 pm   why do the titles of "i'm best friends with my own front door", 'mount st. helens is about to blow up", "the moon is made of cheese (but i can't taste it)", "when i get older" and "slow down" contain capital letters?

      why not

5.28.22  1:33 pm   Is your next song a song?

      just about

5.28.22  1:28 pm   thoughts on the Sahara desert

      it's the Desert desert. (Sahara means desert)

5.28.22  1:07 pm   Is it ok to write/sing a bluegrass song about missing my home back in the hills of Tennessee, even though I am not from, nor have I ever been to, Tennessee?

      yes. you're making me want to do that

5.28.22  12:23 pm   how to get ideas

      impossible. it can't be done

5.28.22  11:25 am   how real are words

      exactly halfway. the other person can meet you in the middle

5.28.22  9:49 am   what if you saw a firework that looks just like a pig?

      then it would be time to celebrate

5.28.22  9:14 am   have you ever laughed out loud at an idea to put into a video and then went ahead and put it in the video, if so could you give an example

      i believe when i was recording the vocal for "cool sports", the ghosted 'fuckin' before was vocally improvised and i made myself laugh

5.28.22  9:12 am   is there some sort of story behind "At the Corner Store"? Maybe you simply went to the store and thought about that melody, or it was just like "Fly Around" which you said was just a melody between some chords?

      on a song generation session, i just started playing a Bb bass note at a certain tempo, and then the melodic/chord riff popped into mind. sort of a dummy lyric came with it, that said "at the corner store, getting things you need for the brand new world". i made a specific note to myself NOT to use that lyric, because i was tired of all the store/retail references in my work. and i also have some more upcoming store-related material (which i like) that i'd rather not cannibalize. So the first thing on the writing session was to try to find anything alse besides the store, to put on that riff. but nothing else fit as well as the corner store. i relented and made it about the store.

5.28.22  7:08 am   should i invent earth

      sure. go ahead

5.28.22  5:01 am   How to make lots of money?

      figure out how to provide something that no one else in the world can provide

5.28.22  2:38 am   Do you ever export early versions of your songs, for posterity or otherwise?

      i export it when the writing is done, then i export it when the vocal is done (i call this "pre-arr"), and i export it again when the arrangement is done (i call this "pre-mix) and then again when the mix is done (that would be the final version)

5.28.22  1:35 am   was If the World Doesn't End selected from a pool of written songs to be recorded later or what is written and then recorded consecutively or something else

      it was selected from a long list of potential songs, ranging from 1% to 99% complete. "if the world doesn't end" would certainly be in the 1% category. it was only a title, and it had only been in the list for a week when it was selected

5.28.22  1:08 am   So the thing is, when I'm at school I  h a t e  it and think "if I just had an easy job that wouldn't leave me with work to take home, that would be enough and I would be fine." But now I have a job like that more or less (it's still hard/stressful, but I don't get homework or essays assigned or anything), and I'm still miserable. So what's wrong? A long way of saying I'm fucking dreading work in 12hrs.

      it sounds like you should take on some new and interesting challenges

5.27.22  11:40 pm   Should I go to the gym when school gets out

      yes, but only if you know where you're going to go after that

5.27.22  11:02 pm   can you play the snare drum really fast?

      yes

      musically

      i doubt it

5.27.22  7:43 pm   Hey I found a bench that says "bench" on it

      are you sure it was a bench

5.27.22  7:24 pm   Opinions on maps?

      dank

5.27.22  7:22 pm   will your next song be a sequel?

     no

      if so, to what song?

5.27.22  6:08 pm   Will you make a song about camping?

      all options are on the table

5.27.22  5:27 pm   should I buy seven thousand cows

      always rent cows

5.27.22  4:01 pm   What is the first song you remember hearing?

      waltz of the flowers

5.27.22  12:19 pm   What's a good strategy for giving names to fictional characters?

      choose a name that they should not have. and use that as a temporary name. and then don't change it

5.27.22  11:33 am   can you write my social studies essay thabks

      i could write everything else besides that

5.27.22  9:37 am   Its-a-da last day of school and I forgot to school

      that makes sense

5.27.22  8:16 am   have you gone to mount st. helens?

      no

5.27.22  6:34 am   Why do you make weird videos

      i have never made a weird video

5.27.22  1:22 am   Were you always good at singing

     no

     or did you learn how to sing?

     sort of

     I really wanna sing but I'm bad at it, how can I learn?

     i'm not sure. it's one of the big mysteries for me. it's deeply connected to your soul somehow

     Or is it even something you CAN learn?

     yes

     I have trouble singing in my house since my family makes fun of it if I do. Do I do it anyway?

      if you have to

5.27.22  12:06 am   you ever go to your local graveyard at night?

      no

5.26.22  10:00 pm   I wonder what effect all these human emotions and thoughts are having on space and time? The emotions that humans feel have to be leaving their energy somewhere. Like, imagine a kitchen. There are so many normal things in a kitchen. Then in the middle of the kitchen, you've got a human body with a small head. Inside that small head, there could be emotions that are so powerful that they feel like they encapsulate the entire world. And that all happens in that little physical sphere, right in that kitchen? I mean come on, where does that energy all go?! Mars???!!!

      the most significant way that human emotions show their effects is when they cause the person to do something

5.26.22  9:36 pm   are there any songs you think are bad?

      i was going to say yes but now that i think about it no

5.26.22  8:36 pm   what are your plans for world domination

      let the world dominate itself
